name: You Are My One True Love
name_original: You Are My One True Love
description:
My name is Tzani and I was a 3D artist at Snapshot games. 

This is my first attempt at a 2D pixel art game. I enjoyed drawing the sprites and learning new and interesting software for this project. YouTubers like Brakeys helped my a lot this past week. Even though I could only work in the evenings and I was working alone I had a lot of fun creating this little" time-waster". 

 A lot of features got left on the cutting room floor but I hope you enjoy my game.

Credits:

Art and coding: Tsanislav Filipov

Music: Diamond Ortiz (YouTube Music Library)
